author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (51 Photos)
text:
38 39 
I wanted to offer a huge congratulations to all my friends at CBS Films Lionsgate on today’s FOUR Oscar Nominations for ‘Hell or High Water‘, including Best Picture and Best Supporting actor, Jeff Bridges! 
As y’all know, theCHIVE was the very first to tout how great this film was. Jeff Bridges and Chris Pine believed in this film so much they both traveled to Austin, TX, for a legendary podcast with Bob and I. 
During that podcast Jeff Bridges told a touching and hilarious story of the moment he met his wife that theCHIVE animated, which which quickly went viral . 
Congrats again to the cast and crew of this amazing film. 40
